title: Jarvan main that would love to have victorious Jarvan in his skin collection
body: So i was wondering whether there was any way i could obtain this skin, it really annoys me that i can't get it im a J4 1 trick and ive never seen this skin in game i want it so bad does anyone know of any way i could get this skin. I saw a post where some people were saying they have it etc. I was wondering if anyone had any info for it i hate that there are some skins you simply can't obtain cause i did not play in season 1.

replies.body:
I know it sucks, I like the skin too but I think it and similar skins, should stay locked if you didn't earn it in X season. It adds to the prestige of the skin.
So when you see a Victorious J4/Janna/Elise whatever, you'll think "Damn, that guy has been playing for some time."
It was only available to people who reached gold or higher in season 1. There is no other possible way to obtain it unless you bought an account, which would be breaking the rules. Up to you.

It exclusive skin for season 1 gold+ 

There is no way to obtain it on your account; You can buy an account that has it though.
